summary: REQUIRES DRAGONBORN. Just a 1 corridor/2 rooms mini-dungeon I made to test what could be done with the Redoran Hut set (not much). It's also configured to work with the "Fetch Me that Book!" radiant quest.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6]SADRANI ANCESTRAL TOMB Version 1.0[/size][/center]
[center][size=2]By Mr. C. Racer[/size][/center]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59457/?]Traducción española.[/url]
Just a 1 corridor/2 rooms mini-dungeon in the style of Morrowind's ancestral tombs, made to test what could be done with the Redoran Hut set (not much). It's also configured to work with the "Fetch Me that Book!" radiant quest. See picture for the location of the dungeon.

-------------------
REQUIREMENTS
-------------------

- Dragonborn DLC.

-----------------
INSTALLATION
-----------------

Unzip all the files and drop them on your Skyrim/Data folder, overwriting if asked, and activate the plugin in the Skyrim launcher. The file has been fully cleaned with TES5Edit 3.0.32.

--------
BUGS
--------

- None.

-----------
HISTORY
-----------

Version 1.0: First version.

-----------
CREDITS
-----------

- Red dunmer lantern: InsanitySorrow.
- Everything else: Mr. C. Racer

--------------
THANKS TO
--------------

- InsanitySorrow for the free resources.
- The people at the official TES forums.
- The TES5Edit team.
- Bethesda.
author: MCR
